subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Vyacheslav Fetisov, now a Russian senator, said a rule to keep players from leaving for the N.H.L. before age 28 would keep “our most talented guys” in front of hockey fans in their home country.
snippet: Vyacheslav Fetisov, now a Russian senator, said a rule to keep players from leaving for the N.H.L. before age 28 would keep “our most talented guys” in front of hockey fans in their home country.
